backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to two Contact section text nodes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files and their roles in the CV site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers with custom OKLCH color variables and darkâ€‘mode themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, fonts, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all CV sections, applying SEO, and rendering a custom footer.
frontend/src/components/cv/ContactSectio: Renders contact methods as interactive cards; Google Drive item labeled 'Projects' with value 'Google Drive'.
frontend/src/components/cv/EducationSect: Displays education entries with degree, institution, dates, location, and optional details.
frontend/src/components/cv/ExperienceSec: Timeline-style work experience list with role, company, location, and bullet descriptions.
frontend/src/components/cv/HeroSection.t: Hero banner with background image, profile photo, name, title, summary, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/cv/ProjectsSecti: Grid of project cards with descriptions, technologies, and links to demos and GitHub.
frontend/src/components/cv/Section.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper enforcing consistent spacing and titles for sections.
frontend/src/components/cv/SkillsSection: Displays categorized skills with styled badges in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/cv/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based active section tracking and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/data/cv.ts: Defines CV-related TypeScript interfaces and provides static CV data for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoFromCvData.ts: Updates document title and meta tags based on CV data for SEO and social previews.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines custom OKLCH color variables and theme settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending UI label update requests.
